attributes.action: reassess our diplomatic friendship with the United States of America
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the long history of staunch support which the United Kingdom has to the United States of America, and the terrible manner in which this unwavering support has been treated, specifically in the refusal of President Obama to back the United Kingdoms' soverignty over the falkland islands as well as many other situations including extradition rights, we ask the Prime Minister to finally act to equal out our relationship. We ask that he either do this by finally taking a stand against the USA on issues of UK national interest or begin a withdrawl of the steadfast and staunch support which we have continuously offered the USA.
